description: Spanning two centuries, from the founding of the colonies to the close of the Civil War, this
course begins our discussion of questions central to the entire sequence: "What is an American?"
"What does it mean to be free?" Students explore the institutions, images, and stories of
Euro-Americans, African Americans, and Native Americans.Topics and texts include the
Declaration of Independence and Thomas Jefferson's architecture, the Narrative of the Life
of Frederick Douglass and the coming of the Civil War.
